channel.title: 508! CUSTOMIZABLE CLIENT! {508}! Newb-Friendly Client! Editable Client! Custom
channel.description:
[size=20pt]Customizable 508 Client[/size] [b][i]As the Title says this Client (508) is user-friendly and you can modify it to how ever you want it to be (Themes etc.)[/i][/b]
[img]http://img2.pict.com/b4/cc/67/3c8eebd5bdd96c89753ecbbaaa/8hc6k/cc.png[/img] [img]http://img2.pict.com/50/0d/17/f915c35b5ab16b0f64d4198829/dzvxn/llall4.png[/img]
[size=15pt]NOTE: IF YOU DO NOT LIKE IT PLEASE IMMEDIATELY LEAVE THIS TOPIC. IF YOU HAVE ANGER RELATED ISSUES PLEASE THINK ABOUT GETTING A RELIGION.[/size]
[size=30pt][b]Some Features of the Client[/b][/size]:
+Duh, It's editable that obviously means there are binary source codes.
+No need to worry about where to put the cache. The whole 508 deob cache is in the client folder. This makes the client much more portable and easy to use (Newb-Friendly)
+100%! Yes 100% 508 Deob Mapdata. No crashes when you visit all the places throughout runescape. Unlike previous 508 clients when you visit certain spots it crashes due to incomplete mapdata. Well now you don't have to worry this client includes 100% Mapdata.
+Customizable Background screen, sprites, ingame images. Thanks jonathan.
+Client Customizing tool is included in the client folder!
+The Client IP Connects to localhost; 0.0.0.0 (You can change in client.java)
Basic Instructions (Already in readme file in client folder)
NOTE! YOU MIGHT WANT TO READ AND SAVE THE TEXT BELOW OR PRINT IT [code=java]Max's Friendly editable personal Client (Deob Version: 508)
How to use:
Just extract the client anywhere no need to worry about where to put the cache. Like all of previous 317 clients, Their cache is in the folder itself.
How to modify sprites:
Open the lurd-layton508client.rar extract anywhere.
Extract 'custom_Sprites.rar' anywhere.
Extract 'dumps.rar' anywhere
1. choose what image you want in 'dumps'
2. After you have decided, Copy and paste the image(s) in 'sprites' folder inside 'custom_sprites' folder. (DO NOT CHANGE THE IMAGE's NAME)
3. You may put up to multiple images in the 'sprites' folder.
4. Next, Click 'run' in the 'custom_sprites' Folder
5. The batch will generate 2 files which are 'sprites.dat' and 'sprites.idx'
6. Just drag the 2 new files into 'cache' folder. (The 'cache' folder is located inside the client's 'files' folder
(Path-Map: Lurd-LaytonClient -> files -> cache)[/code]
For moparscapians with a cautious attitude: [img]http://img2.pict.com/42/ae/da/fdf33215ff3ff9d1b85dda109a/Vg6fz/llscan.png[/img]
Random Pictures on the customized client: [size=6pt]The arrows pointing down i didn't add it in paint, it's the modified 'skull' sprite.[/size] [img]http://img2.pict.com/9f/0b/89/3e22e654a941c71c10987a9cb3/Go5c5/800/clientsc2.png[/img]
[img]http://img2.pict.com/cd/7c/f2/27d2846b9b8003726400a570c8/MZh0Q/clientsc.png[/img]
[img]http://img2.pict.com/95/31/59/34c748770b007ea0ae29cc9108/Q1MHW/clientsc1.png[/img]
[img]http://img2.pict.com/d2/f2/d0/096f3aa1d04ffed14046a0f08d/GErXp/clientsc3.png[/img]
FAQs: Q:Is there dragon claws or dragon platebody? A:No.. this client is only for beginners and little maggots this client is designed for custom use prior to your personal taste. Q:But duude.. i want to add dragon claws and d plate custom items shit A: ummm..... ok.... it's easy.. the cache and models are already included in the client files go to r-s forum and find the custom model tut. Q: Your gay seriously A: gtfo nerd
[url=http://uppit.com/v/0TUWOUJH][img]http://img522.imageshack.us/img522/3097/downloadbutton.th.png[/img][/url]
ENJOY! :)
CREDITS Me Jonathan moparscapians
[size=6pt]Want to create your own cool logo? http://lurd-laytontech.blogspot.com[/size]

[quote=“Maxxxx, post:24, topic:273966”][quote author=public boolean link=topic=362010.msg2756221#msg2756221 date=1240226075]
Wow, your sprites do look pretty retarded, heard of Photoshop?
[/quote]

L0l?! Retarded like your gay fantasy runehexz server logo?

Lol? Arabian nerd your balls is retarted. Haven’t you read bitch? Faggot, it’s called a simple start-off client for nerds like you that’s why it’s an example picture. If you’re a fucking retarted bitch with small eyes the same size of your arse and hate this topic go fuck someone elsewhere. Don’t start your shit with me here. I’m sick of hearing your mental issues, don’t discuss it with me. 1. Get a fresh air nerd. 2. Relax chill, We don’t care about ‘photoshop’ shit it’s called pixels. Nerds like you care about them alot. 3. Get a life umair, you think your great but you’re just a pain the ass nerd with huge ego. Ever heard of Psychiatrist? Faggot.

Also douche, your gay-ass ‘ruin3hexzz’ server fail. Move on to 530s, it’s called a ‘cache retriever’. Get it before ejaculating.
Grow some pubic hair and mature a bit before coming back here gaywad.[/quote]An example of the common MoparScapian. You need to learn to grow up and not over-react to little things.
